DOC.brief_summary: This study is to evaluate the efficacy of CT-P27 measured by quantitative PCR viral load from nasopharyngeal mucosa, compared to placebo.
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of CT-P27 in an Influenza Challenge Model
DOC.criteria: Healthy Male & Female volunteers Current clinically significant disease Pregnant or nursing mother Abnormal pulmonary function, nose or nasopharynx
